name: Lazy Poring[1] Blueprint
description: Praised as the continent's most popular monster three times in row, the touching feeling is even more comfortable than touching the cat! All Poring have a puzzle: after eating and sleeping, why do you always hit me?

name: Leaf of Aloe
description: Cut off the Aloe leaves and gather the leaves to restore 325-405 points of HP.

name: Leaf of Hinal
description: With a fresh and cool taste, it can help users forget the pain and restore 175-235 points of HP.

name: Leaf of Yggdrasil
description: The leaf of Yggdrasil that created the world. It has magic power to revive the roles that have lost energy for fighting.

name: Leather Armor
description: The men's clothes convenient for movement.

name: Leather Armor[1]
description: Leather armor made from monster fur. It has been cut and hardened by curing agent.

name: Leather Jacket
description: A low-priced leather coat, which shows a special style after being used for a long time.

name: Leather Jacket [1]
description: A low-priced leather coat, which shows a special style after being used for a long time.

name: Leather of Tendrilion [2]
description: The skin of a deltoid with plant stems growing on its fur.

name: Leather of Tendrilion[1]
description: The skin of a deltoid with plant stems growing on its fur.

name: Leave me Alone
description: A wizard music record. With it, You can order songs in the music box spot newly designed by Kafra. [Hot! Dry! There's only sand! Sand! Oh, My God. Don't you feel burning?]

name: Leaves Skirt
effect: Def ＋15,When Refining ＋10 and Luck reaches 90, Crit.Dmg ＋5%

name: Legion Plate Armor
description: The silver-glowing armor, made by famous craftsman, provides overall protection.
